item.label: Architecturally Significant
item.description: A requirement that will directly influence the overall system architecture.

item.label: General Requirement
item.description: A general requirement used in most projects. Should be included by default.

item.label: Security
item.description: A requirement related to application security. Canidate for audit process.

item.label: Statuatory
item.description: A requirement governed by a specific federal or state statute.

item.label: Subjective
item.description: A requirement that is dependant on the interpretation of an individual where no clear test plan can be written.
